hero.title: Shopify App Detector
hero.subtitle: Discover Apps Installed on Any Shopify Store
hero.description: Analyze any Shopify store to detect installed apps, understand competitor strategies, and discover new tools for your own store. Free, fast, and comprehensive app detection tool.

whatIsIt.title: What is Shopify App Detector?
whatIsIt.description: Our Shopify App Detector is a powerful free tool that analyzes any Shopify store to identify the apps and extensions they have installed. By examining app blocks, scripts, and other technical indicators, our Shopify App Detector provides comprehensive insights into the technology stack behind successful Shopify stores.
keyPoints: Detect Shopify apps installed on any store
Discover new Shopify apps for your own store
Free and unlimited Shopify app detection
Instant Shopify app analysis with detailed information

howItWorks.title: How Does Our Shopify App Detector Work?
howItWorks.description: Our advanced Shopify App Detector algorithm analyzes multiple data points to identify installed Shopify apps with high accuracy.

faqs.title: Frequently Asked Questions About Our Shopify App Detector
faqs.description: Common questions about our Shopify App Detector and app detection process

questions.question: How accurate is the Shopify App Detector?
questions.answer: Our Shopify App Detector is highly accurate, identifying most installed apps through multiple detection methods. However, some apps may not be detectable if they don't leave visible traces in the store's code or if they're custom-built solutions.

questions.question: Is the Shopify App Detector free to use?
questions.answer: Yes, our Shopify App Detector is completely free to use with no limitations on the number of stores you can analyze.

questions.question: Can I detect apps on any Shopify store?
questions.answer: Yes, you can analyze any public Shopify store. Simply enter the store's URL and our Shopify App Detector will identify the installed apps.

questions.question: What types of Shopify apps can be detected?
questions.answer: Our Shopify App Detector can identify various types of apps including marketing tools, analytics, customer service, payment gateways, shipping solutions, and many others that leave detectable traces in the store's code.

questions.question: How often is the Shopify app database updated?
questions.answer: Our Shopify App Detector database is regularly updated to include new apps and improve detection accuracy. We continuously monitor the Shopify App Store for new releases.

questions.question: Can I see which Shopify apps my competitors are using?
questions.answer: Yes, that's one of the main use cases for our Shopify App Detector. You can analyze competitor stores to understand their app strategy and discover tools that might benefit your own store.

questions.question: Does the tool work on mobile devices?
questions.answer: Yes, our Shopify App Detector is fully responsive and works perfectly on mobile devices, tablets, and desktop computers.

questions.question: Is my search data stored or tracked?
questions.answer: We respect your privacy. Store URLs you analyze are not stored permanently, and we don't track your usage patterns for marketing purposes.
